meaningMnemonic: If you want to become a <kanji>martyr</kanji> during your <kanji>employment</kanji> you need to <vocabulary>die at your post</vocabulary>. I don't know why you'd WANT to do that though.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
